Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent VELOCITY = 50 -- constant loaded=false
local Pellet = Instance.new("Part") Pellet.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green") Pellet.Shape = 0 Pellet.formFactor = 0 Pellet.Size = Vector3.new(3,3,3) Pellet.Locked = true Pellet.TopSurface = 0 Pellet.Transparency = 0.8 Pellet.BottomSurface = 0
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(51/255,205/255,51/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0,102/255,0) fire.Heat = 13 fire.Parent = Pellet
script.Parent.SnowballScript:clone().Parent = Pellet
function fire(v, shootDirect)
-- find player's head pos
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local head = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Head") if head == nil then return end
Tool.Handle.Fire:Play() local launch = head.Position + 10 * v
local missile = Pellet:clone() missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(launch,shootDirect) missile.Position = launch missile.Velocity = v * 130
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,2775,0) force.Parent = missile
missile.SnowballScript.Disabled = false
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
end
function onEquipped() Tool.Handle.Fire:Stop() end
function onUnequipped() Tool.Handle.Fire:Stop() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
enabled = true function onActivated() if not enabled then return end
enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit shootDirect = targetPos
fire(lookAt, shootDirect)
while Tool.Reload.Value > 0 do wait() end
enabled = true
end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

arrow = script.Parent
local prevVelocity = 0 local particles = {}
debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function Snowface(h,hit)
local torso = h.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if torso ~= nil then
local bodyVelo = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") print(prevVelocity) bodyVelo.velocity = prevVelocity bodyVelo.P = 20000 bodyVelo.maxForce = Vector3.new(bodyVelo.P,bodyVelo.P,bodyVelo.P) bodyVelo.Parent = hit debris:AddItem(bodyVelo, 1.5)
end
end
function Explode()
local count = 5
for i=1,count do local p = Instance.new("Part") p.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green") p.Name = "Green particle" p.formFactor = 0 p.Transparency = 0.8 p.Shape = 0 p.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) p.TopSurface = 0 p.BottomSurface = 0
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Name = "Fire" fire.Color = Color3.new(51/255,205/255,51/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0,102/255,0) fire.Heat = 9 fire.Size = 3 fire.Parent = p
p.Velocity = (-arrow.Velocity/2) * (4 + (math.random() *2)) p.Position = arrow.Position + (arrow.Velocity * math.random() * .05) + Vector3.new(0,math.random() * 3, 0) p.Parent = game.Workspace
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,90,0) force.Parent = p
table.insert(particles,p) end
delay(2,killParticles)
end
function killParticles()
for i = 1, #particles do particles[i].Transparency = 1 particles[i].Fire.Enabled = false debris:AddItem(particles[i],3) end local particles = {}
end
function onTouched(hit)
connection:disconnect()
if hit.Parent ~= nil then humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid~=nil then arrow.Transparency = 1 arrow.Fire.Enabled = false Snowface(humanoid, hit) end end
Explode()
wait(5) arrow:Remove()
end
connection = arrow.Touched:connect(onTouched)
debris:AddItem(arrow,60)
while true do
prevVelocity = arrow.Velocity wait(0.1)
end

local Tool = script.Parent local cast = nil
local enabled = false function activated() if enabled then return end enabled = true
Tool.Reload.Value = 5 cast:Play()
while Tool.Reload.Value > 1 do Tool.Reload.Value = Tool.Reload.Value - 1 wait(1) end
Tool.Reload.Value = 0 enabled = false end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" cast = Tool.Parent.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.wandcast) mouse.Button1Down:connect(activated) end
function onUnequippedLocal()
cast:Stop() cast:remove() cast = nil
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
